channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ireland Thinks for The Irish Daily Mail, 26 December 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Fine Gael (EPP): 30.0–34.7%
  • Fianna Fáil (RE): 26.7–31.1%
  • Sinn Féin (GUE/NGL): 15.5–19.2%
  • Labour Party (S&D): 4.7–7.0%

  • Social Democrats (S&D): 2.7–4.5%
  • Green Party (Greens/EFA): 6.8–9.5%
  • Independents 4 Change (GUE/NGL): 0.1–0.7%
  • Independents (*): 0.1–0.7%
